publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2392 Dr Richard Simpson: Congratulations to the Scottish Rugby Union—That the Parliament notes that the Scottish Rugby Union (SRU) has now appointed 56 development officers across Scotland; welcomes the increasing opportunities being provided by rugby clubs and schools for young people to participate in rugby; acknowledges the important role played by volunteers in developing and sustaining this effort and welcomes the use of funds from confiscation of criminal assets to support the SRU’s work in this field; recognises the increasing ties between the SRU, its clubs and touch rugby; congratulates the Scottish teams participating in the European championship in Paris on 11 to 12 July 2008 on achieving one gold, two silver and a bronze, and calls on businesses to consider developing touch rugby teams as an excellent way of promoting a healthy, social and sporting lifestyle.
S3M-2392Congratulations to the Scottish Rugby Union (lodged on 13 August 2008) Jamie Hepburn*, Jack McConnell*
